Frequently Asked Questions

The best time for tiger sightings is from October to April when the weather is cooler and animals are more active near water sources. The park remains closed during the monsoon season (July to September).

A Gypsy is a 6-seater open-top jeep ideal for small groups offering more flexibility and better wildlife viewing. A Canter is a 20-seater open bus more economical for larger groups but with less mobility.

Wear earth-toned clothing (avoid bright colors), comfortable shoes, a hat, and sunscreen. Bring binoculars, a camera, water, and any personal medications. Winters can be chilly, so layer appropriately.

Yes, children are allowed but must be supervised at all times. Children under 5 years may find the bumpy rides uncomfortable. We recommend private Gypsy safaris for families with young children.

Most packages offer free cancellation up to 15 days before travel. Within 15 days, cancellation charges may apply. Safari permits are non-refundable once booked. Please check individual package terms for details.
